Ooc:

You're welcome.

I thought it wise for Tucson to track him, since he'=
s blind, has experience in pure darkness, and is also a ninjabot warrior.  =
After all, he who navigates in the dark, is highly aclimated to it.  He kno=
ws that if Rodimus Prime tried to confront him, it wouldn't end well for hi=
m, and he wants to prevent that from happening to Rodimus again.  Tucson is=
n't a bot to toil with, and he's going to make that rather clear to Nightra=
zor and the other cons and preds.  He is a bit different than Prime, in the=
 sense that he's a tad more tenatious.  We definitely got a good storyline =
going here.  Laters.
